revised_title: Classification and Anatomy of Sclerodermic Zoantharia Genera
tldr: The author examines the classification and anatomy of the Sclerodermic Zoantharia genera Heterophyllia, Battersbyia, Palaeocyclus, and Asterosmilia. They discuss the practical and natural classification proposed by Milne-Edwards and Jules Haime, and introduce the new genus Asterosmilia, which unites the Turbinolides and Astraeides divisions. The author also describes the anatomy of Heterophyllia and Battersbyia, and their placement among the Astraeidse.
